name: Crown of Watatsumi
title: Pearl Crown â€” Crown of Watatsumi
desc: "The people of the sea sing that these crowns of pearls and coral will never be stained by any dirt."
in_play_description:
For every 3 HP of healing your characters receive, this card accumulates 1 Sea-Dyed Foam. (Maximum of 2, Current healing received: ${[GCG_TOKEN_SHIELD]})
When this character deals DMG: Consume all Sea-Dyed Foam. DMG is increased by 1 for each one consumed.
